txt.en: 'Where is it that you come from?'
Register your heritage with the notary.

'Ah... Bree-land.\n\n'You grew up here in Bree-land, once part of the North Kingdom of Arnor, once ruled by Elendil the Tall as High King of Middle-earth, and later by his elder son Isildur. Now it is but a simple, rustic land, and the North Kingdom is no more.'
Speak with Bonnie Milkweed, the notary
Bonnie Milkweed can be found in the Bree-town Hall.
